title: DeepSeek AI: The Revolutionary Chatbot App Dominating the AI Race?
body: Is the AI landscape about to be revolutionized? If you’re tracking the crypto world, you know disruptive tech when you see it. DeepSeek, a Chinese AI lab, has suddenly become a major player, much like a new cryptocurrency surging onto the scene. Their AI chatbot app has skyrocketed to the top of app store charts, sparking intense debate about the future of AI leadership and the demand for AI chips. Let’s dive into the story of DeepSeek and understand why this AI chatbot is creating such a buzz. What are the Origins of DeepSeek AI? DeepSeek’s story is rooted in the world of finance. It’s backed by High-Flyer Capital Management, a Chinese hedge fund that leverages AI models for smart trading decisions. Liang Wenfeng, an AI enthusiast and former student, co-founded High-Flyer in 2015. By 2019, High-Flyer was a full-fledged hedge fund, deeply invested in AI algorithms. In 2023, the DeepSeek lab was born, branching out from High-Flyer’s financial focus to explore broader AI model development. This lab then spun off into its own company, retaining the name DeepSeek. From the start, DeepSeek prioritized building its own data centers for training its powerful AI. However, like other Chinese tech companies, DeepSeek has faced headwinds from U.S. export restrictions on advanced hardware. To train its cutting-edge models, DeepSeek reportedly had to rely on Nvidia H800 chips, a less powerful alternative to the H100 chips favored by U.S. companies. Despite these challenges, DeepSeek has assembled a young and ambitious technical team, aggressively recruiting top AI researchers from leading Chinese universities. Interestingly, they also bring in talent from non-computer science backgrounds, aiming to broaden their AI’s understanding across diverse subjects, as reported by The New York Times. DeepSeek’s Breakthrough: How Strong are their AI Models? DeepSeek first made waves in November 2023 with the launch of its initial models: DeepSeek Coder, DeepSeek LLM, and DeepSeek Chat. But it was the release of the next-generation DeepSeek-V2 models in spring that truly grabbed the AI industry’s attention. DeepSeek-V2, a versatile system capable of analyzing both text and images, demonstrated impressive performance in AI benchmarks. Crucially, it was significantly more cost-effective to operate than comparable models available at the time. This price advantage forced competitors in China, including tech giants like ByteDance and Alibaba, to slash prices for their own models, and even make some entirely free. The subsequent launch of DeepSeek-V3 in December 2024 further solidified DeepSeek’s rising prominence. Internal testing by DeepSeek suggests that V3 surpasses both open-source models like Meta’s Llama and closed models like OpenAI’s GPT-4o in performance. Adding to their arsenal is DeepSeek’s R1 “reasoning” model, unveiled in January. DeepSeek claims R1 rivals OpenAI’s o1 model on key benchmarks. Reasoning models like R1 excel at self-correction and fact-checking, leading to greater reliability, particularly in fields like physics, science, and math. While reasoning models may take slightly longer to generate responses, the increased accuracy is a significant advantage. Here’s a quick comparison of DeepSeek’s key models: Model Key Features Strengths Considerations DeepSeek-V2 General-purpose text and image analysis High performance, cost-effective Preceded by V3 DeepSeek-V3 Advanced general-purpose model Outperforms Llama and GPT-4o (per DeepSeek testing) Subject to Chinese regulatory oversight DeepSeek R1 Reasoning model Fact-checks itself, reliable in technical domains Slightly slower response times What are the Downsides of China AI like DeepSeek? There’s a critical aspect to consider with DeepSeek and other China AI models. As they are developed in China, they are subject to content regulations by China’s internet regulator. This means their responses are monitored to ensure they align with “core socialist values.” In practical terms, within the DeepSeek AI chatbot app, certain topics are off-limits. For instance, R1 will not engage with questions about Tiananmen Square or Taiwan’s autonomy. This censorship is a crucial factor for users to be aware of, especially when compared to more openly accessible AI models developed in other regions. Is DeepSeek’s Business Model Sustainable? DeepSeek’s approach to the market is… unconventional. Its pricing strategy is highly disruptive, often undercutting competitors and even offering some products and services for free. DeepSeek attributes this aggressive pricing to breakthroughs in efficiency, allowing them to maintain extreme cost competitiveness. However, some industry experts question the company’s cost figures. Regardless of the exact mechanisms, developers are flocking to DeepSeek’s models. While not strictly open source in the traditional sense, DeepSeek provides permissive licenses that allow for commercial use. Clem Delangue, CEO of Hugging Face, notes that developers on their platform have created over 500 derivative models of R1, accumulating over 2.5 million downloads. What Impact is DeepSeek Having on the AI Industry? DeepSeek’s rapid ascent has been described as both “upending AI” and “over-hyped.” Its impact is undeniable. Notably, DeepSeek’s success was partially blamed for an 18% drop in Nvidia’s stock price on a recent Monday, and even prompted a public statement from OpenAI CEO Sam Altman. Microsoft has also integrated DeepSeek into its Azure AI Foundry service, showcasing its significance in the enterprise AI landscape. Mark Zuckerberg, when questioned about DeepSeek’s impact on Meta’s AI spending, emphasized that AI infrastructure remains a “strategic advantage” for Meta. Interestingly, while some embrace DeepSeek, others are wary. Certain companies, and even entire countries and governments, are reportedly banning DeepSeek. New York state has also prohibited its use on government devices, reflecting growing concerns about foreign influence in AI. What’s Next for DeepSeek AI? The future of DeepSeek remains uncertain, but further advancements in its AI models are almost guaranteed. However, the increasing scrutiny from the U.S. government regarding potential foreign influence could present challenges. DeepSeek’s journey is one to watch closely, as it navigates the complex landscape of global AI competition and regulation. Will DeepSeek continue its disruptive rise, or will geopolitical factors limit its reach? Only time will tell. Stay ahead of the curve in the rapidly evolving world of AI. Subscribe to Bitcoin World’s AI-focused newsletter to receive updates directly in your inbox every Wednesday. This story was originally published January 28, 2025, and will be updated continuously with more information. title: HTX Releases January Security Monthly Report, Sending Over 380,000 Security Reminders to Users
body: SINGAPORE, Feb. 17, 2025 /PRNewswire/ – HTX released its January 2025 Security Monthly Report, reaffirming its commitment to platform security. The report highlights the platform’s multi-layered security measures, including the Merkle Tree Proof of Reserves (PoR), which ensure robust account security, transaction security, and asset security. Since May 2024, HTX has consistently published monthly security reports to enhance transparency, build trust with users, and demonstrate its unwavering commitment to platform security. (Previous reports: May , June , July , August , September , October , November , December .) Account Security: 380,000+ Security Reminders to Prevent Potential Threats In January, HTX proactively addressed potential security threats by issuing over 380,000 security reminders to users, comprising 339,480 email reminders and 40,523 SMS reminders. The platform actively combats phishing and fraudulent activities and successfully shut down 6 phishing websites and fake app download sites to protect users from falling victim to scams. Transaction Security: Recovering $70,000+ in User Funds By Intercepting Abnormal Transactions HTX’s robust risk controls effectively detect and prevent abnormal transactions. In January, the platform intercepted 3 withdrawal attempts to scam addresses, recovering 72,962 USDT in assets for users. Furthermore, by actively investigating user reports, HTX resolved 7 incidents involving stolen assets flowing into the platform, assisting in freezing 193,702 USDT in stolen funds, significantly reducing losses for affected users. Asset Security: 189 New Addresses Blacklisted to Prevent Illicit Inflows HTX remains vigilant in preventing the inflow of illicit funds. In January, the platform added 189 new addresses to its blacklist and intercepted 4 deposits from these addresses, totaling 624,190 USDT. These measures effectively prevented the inflow of illicit funds, further enhancing the platform’s financial health. Reserve Ratio Remains Above 100% with Regular PoR Updates HTX continues to enhance asset transparency by regularly publishing PoR reports. The platform recently updated its Merkle Tree Proof of Reserves for February 2025, demonstrating that its reserve ratio for major mainstream assets consistently exceeds 100%. The latest proof of reserves data includes: BTC 101%, ETH 100%, TRX 105%, USDT 101%, HTX 104%, XRP 101%, DOGE 100%, SOL 102%. This marks the 28th time HTX has publicly disclosed its Merkle Tree reserve data. Users can access the monthly updated reports and view the platform’s financial status from the “Assets – PoR Reports” page on the HTX official website. HTX prioritizes user asset security and transparency. By diligently monitoring and addressing security threats, HTX strives to provide a secure and reliable trading environment for all users. Choosing HTX means choosing a platform that not only offers access to premium early-stage assets but also prioritizes user safety with a robust security framework. About HTX Founded in 2013, HTX has evolved from a virtual asset exchange into a comprehensive ecosystem of blockchain businesses that span digital asset trading, financial derivatives, wallets, research, investments, incubation, and other businesses. As a world-leading gateway to Web3, HTX harbors global capabilities that enable it to provide users with safe and reliable services. Adhering to the growth strategy of “Global Expansion, Thriving Ecosystem, Wealth Effect, Security & Compliance”, HTX is dedicated to providing quality services and values to virtual asset enthusiasts worldwide. title: Binance Again FUD Again: Is Binance Being Sold? CZ and Yi He Respond to Allegations!
body: Binance, the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange, continues to deal with FUDs. At this point, while it was claimed that Binance would be sold, co-founder Yi He and CZ responded to Binance sale rumors. While CZ and Yi He separately denied the Binance sale allegations, CZ said they were open to small-cap investments. Binance founder and former CEO Changpeng Zhao (CZ) denied Binance sale rumors in a post on his X account and attributed these claims to a competitor in Asia. CZ stated that Binance is not for sale, acknowledging that top investors have always shown interest and said that over time they may consider allowing investments with a single-digit percentage. CZ responded to the FUD news with the number 4 and said: “4. Some self-proclaimed competitors in Asia are talking nonsense about selling Binance (CEX). Binance is not for sale as a shareholder. “The best investors have always been interested in Binance. Over time, we may allow some investments in the single-digit percentage range.” Binance co-founder Yi He also responded to claims that “Binance is about to be sold.” Yi He said that such claims were rumors spread by competitors and that Binance regularly interacts with institutions for investment and cooperation discussions. Yi He also added that while Binance is open to exploring partnerships and acquiring other exchanges, there are currently no plans to sell. 4. Some lowly self-perceived competitor in Asia fudding about Binance (CEX) for sale. As a shareholder, Binance is not for sale. Top investors have always been interested in Binance. Over time, we may allow some investments in the single-digit percentage range. — CZ BNB (@cz_binance) February 17, 2025 *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Binance Again FUD Again: Is Binance Being Sold? CZ and Yi He Respond to Allegations!

title: Landmark Meeting: DeepSeek Founder Liang Wenfeng Set to Meet China’s Xi Jinping Amidst Intense AI Race
body: Is the global AI race about to witness a significant shift? Reports are swirling that Liang Wenfeng, the visionary founder of Chinese AI startup DeepSeek, is poised to meet with China’s President Xi Jinping. This potential summit, also expected to include Alibaba’s Jack Ma, is sending ripples through the tech world, particularly in the cryptocurrency and AI sectors. What could this mean for the future of technology and global power dynamics? Let’s dive deep into this developing story. Why is a Meeting Between DeepSeek’s Liang Wenfeng and Xi Jinping a Big Deal? Imagine the founder of a rapidly rising AI company, one that’s directly challenging the dominance of US tech giants, meeting with the paramount leader of China. That’s the magnitude of what’s reportedly on the horizon. Liang Wenfeng , the mind behind DeepSeek, has propelled his startup into the limelight in a remarkably short time. Founded in 2023 as an offshoot of his quantitative hedge fund High-Flyer, DeepSeek has rapidly gained recognition for its powerful, openly accessible AI models. These models have demonstrated impressive capabilities, rivaling and in some cases surpassing leading models from OpenAI and other prominent American AI companies. Here’s why this meeting is generating buzz: Symbolic Support: The meeting is interpreted by many as a strong signal from the Chinese Communist Party. It suggests a move towards a more supportive environment for domestic private-sector firms, especially those in cutting-edge technologies like AI. This is particularly noteworthy given the recent regulatory pressures faced by some Chinese tech giants. Economic Implications: After a period of tightened regulations, this summit could indicate a strategic pivot to bolster the private sector’s innovation and economic contributions. It could pave the way for more favorable policies and investments in the China AI landscape. Geopolitical Significance: With the US and China locked in a technological and economic competition, particularly in AI, this meeting underscores China’s commitment to becoming a global AI superpower. It sends a clear message about China’s ambition to not just compete, but to lead in the AI race . DeepSeek’s Meteoric Rise: A Challenger in the AI Arena Founded just last year, DeepSeek has quickly become a name to reckon with in the global AI landscape. Liang Wenfeng’s leadership has been instrumental in this rapid ascent. Here are some key highlights of DeepSeek’s journey and impact: Impressive Model Performance: DeepSeek’s AI models have showcased remarkable performance, competing directly with industry leaders like OpenAI. This has caught the attention of the global AI community and raised eyebrows in Washington. Open Access Approach: Unlike some of its competitors, DeepSeek has adopted a more open approach, making its models and services readily available. This strategy has fueled rapid adoption and increased its influence in the AI ecosystem. US Concerns: The rapid rise of DeepSeek has not gone unnoticed in the United States. US officials are reportedly concerned about DeepSeek’s growing popularity and capabilities, viewing it as a potential threat to the US’s leading position in AI. This underscores the high stakes of the current AI race . What Does This Mean for the Future of China’s Tech Sector? The reported meeting could be a watershed moment for China’s tech sector. After a period of regulatory headwinds, is the tide turning? Here are potential implications: Potential Impact Description Policy Shift A more supportive stance from the government towards private tech firms, potentially leading to relaxed regulations and increased investment. Investment Boost Increased government and private investment in key technology sectors, particularly China AI , to accelerate innovation and growth. Global Competition Intensified global technological competition, especially in AI, as China aims to challenge and potentially surpass the US. Market Confidence Improved market confidence in Chinese tech companies, potentially attracting more international investors. Jack Ma’s Presence: Adding Another Layer to the Narrative The expected presence of Alibaba founder Jack Ma at the summit further amplifies the significance of this event. Jack Ma, once a symbol of China’s tech dynamism, has maintained a lower profile in recent years. His potential attendance alongside Liang Wenfeng could signal a broader message of support for the private sector and a unified front in the AI race . It may also suggest a reconciliation and a renewed emphasis on the contributions of tech entrepreneurs to China’s economic and technological advancement. The Cryptocurrency Angle: Why Crypto Enthusiasts Should Pay Attention While the meeting is centered around AI, the cryptocurrency world should definitely take note. Here’s why: Technological Intersections: AI and blockchain, the underlying technology of cryptocurrencies, are increasingly converging. Advancements in AI can enhance blockchain technologies, and vice versa. Developments in China AI can indirectly influence the global crypto landscape. Economic Policy Signals: Changes in China’s approach to its tech sector, as signaled by this meeting, can reflect broader economic policy shifts. These shifts can impact various sectors, including cryptocurrency, even if indirectly. Global Tech Race Dynamics: The AI race is part of a larger global technological and economic competition. Understanding these dynamics is crucial for navigating the evolving landscape of digital assets and technologies. Conclusion: A Pivotal Moment for China and the Global AI Landscape? The reported meeting between DeepSeek founder Liang Wenfeng and Xi Jinping is more than just a routine summit. It has the potential to be a landmark event, signaling a significant shift in China’s approach to its private tech sector and its ambitions in the global AI race . For the cryptocurrency and broader tech communities, this development warrants close attention. It could foreshadow a new era of innovation, competition, and policy evolution in the rapidly changing world of artificial intelligence. title: Shocking Rejection: OpenAI Board Unanimously Dismisses Elon Musk’s $97.4B Acquisition Bid
body: In a dramatic turn of events shaking the foundations of the artificial intelligence world, OpenAI’s board of directors has delivered a resounding ‘no’ to Elon Musk’s staggering $97.4 billion acquisition bid. This bold move, labeled as a ‘blunt’ rejection, highlights the intense rivalry and differing visions for the future of AI, particularly relevant to those in the cryptocurrency space closely watching tech giants’ moves. Let’s dive into the details of this high-stakes standoff. Why Did OpenAI Board Issue a Stinging Board Rejection ? According to a statement from Bret Taylor, OpenAI’s board chair, the rejection was not just unanimous but also firmly positioned against Musk’s motives. Taylor explicitly called Musk’s bid ‘an attempt to disrupt his competition.’ This suggests a deep-seated mistrust and a belief that Musk’s intentions are not aligned with OpenAI’s core mission. Here’s a breakdown of the key reasons behind this forceful board rejection : Mission Integrity: OpenAI was founded as a non-profit with the goal of ensuring artificial general intelligence (AGI) benefits all humanity. The board seems to believe that Musk’s acquisition would jeopardize this original mission. Competition Concerns: OpenAI views Musk, particularly with his AI company xAI, as a direct competitor. Selling to a competitor is inherently problematic, especially given the sensitive nature of AI development. Value Discrepancy: While $97.4 billion is a massive sum, OpenAI’s board, through its counsel, indicated that Musk’s bid ‘doesn’t set a value for [OpenAI’s] nonprofit’ and reiterated that the nonprofit is ‘not for sale.’ This implies the board believes OpenAI’s value, especially in terms of its mission and future potential, is beyond monetary offers. Legal Battles: Musk himself is already embroiled in a lawsuit against OpenAI, alleging anti-competitive behavior and fraud. Accepting an acquisition bid from someone actively suing the company would be highly unusual and legally complex. Elon Musk’s Bold Acquisition Bid : A Power Play or Genuine Interest? Elon Musk’s surprise acquisition bid sent shockwaves through the tech world. Coming from a co-founder who later became critical of OpenAI’s direction, the offer raises questions about his true intentions. Was it a strategic move to gain control, a genuine attempt to steer OpenAI back to its original non-profit roots, or something else entirely? Consider these points: Unsolicited Offer: The bid was unsolicited, indicating Musk was attempting a hostile takeover of sorts, bypassing standard acquisition protocols. Timing and Context: The bid came amidst Musk’s lawsuit against OpenAI, adding a layer of complexity and suspicion to his motives. Public Statements: Musk and his allies have publicly criticized OpenAI and Sam Altman, accusing them of deviating from the original mission and prioritizing profit over public benefit. This suggests a desire to ‘correct’ OpenAI’s course. Alternative Motives: Some speculate Musk’s bid was a tactic to disrupt OpenAI’s progress, slow down competition, or gain leverage in his ongoing lawsuit. The Broader Implications for AI and the Tech Landscape This dramatic rejection underscores the high stakes and intense competition in the AI sector. It’s not just about business deals; it’s about the future direction of a technology with profound implications for society. Here are some broader takeaways for the AI landscape: Value of Mission-Driven Companies: OpenAI’s board’s firm stance highlights the importance of mission-driven organizations, especially in rapidly evolving and impactful fields like AI. Regulatory Scrutiny: The clash between Musk and OpenAI could attract increased regulatory scrutiny of AI development and corporate structures within the industry. Increased Competition: The rivalry between Musk’s xAI and OpenAI is set to intensify, pushing both companies to innovate faster and potentially in different directions. Focus on Ethical AI: The debate around OpenAI’s non-profit versus for-profit structure and Musk’s accusations emphasize the ongoing discussion about ethical considerations in AI development and deployment. What’s Next in the OpenAI Saga? The OpenAI saga is far from over. While the acquisition bid has been rejected, the underlying tensions and legal battles remain. Here’s what to watch for: Lawsuit Outcome: Musk’s lawsuit against OpenAI will continue, and its outcome could significantly impact OpenAI’s restructuring plans and future direction. OpenAI’s Restructuring: OpenAI is still in the process of transitioning to a public benefit corporation. Musk is attempting to halt this conversion, and the legal fight over this will be crucial. Public Opinion and Pressure: Public and industry opinion could play a role in shaping the narrative and influencing both OpenAI’s and Musk’s actions. Future Bids?: While this bid was rejected, it remains to be seen if Musk or other parties will make future attempts to acquire or influence OpenAI. In Conclusion: A Power Struggle for the Future of AI OpenAI’s resounding rejection of Elon Musk’s acquisition bid is a powerful statement about the company’s commitment to its mission and its determination to remain independent. This clash is more than just a business dispute; it’s a power struggle over the future of AI, its ethical development, and its accessibility. For those in the crypto world and beyond, this saga serves as a crucial reminder of the high stakes and intense competition shaping the future of technology. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features.

title: Ethereum’s Giant Megaphone Pattern Sets $7.7K to $9.9K ETH Price Target
body: Ethereum price continues to struggle amid major market share losses and weak market sentiment in the crypto industry. It has slipped by over 30% from its November highs, meaning that it is in a technical bear market. One crypto analyst, however, believes that the ETH price has formed a megaphone pattern pointing to a strong surge. ETH Price Forms a Giant Megaphone Pattern The ongoing ETH price weakness may be a good sign to buy as it continues to set up the giant megaphone or a rising broadening wedge chart pattern on the weekly chart . According to Titan of Crypto , the coin started forming this pattern in 2023. As the name suggests, a megaphone pattern is made up of several higher highs and higher lows. One then connects the higher highs and higher lows with a trendline. The two trendlines move in a divergent pattern, forming what looks like a megaphone. Ethereum recently fell to the lower side of this megaphone, and Titan expects that it will bounce back and surge to between $7,700 and $9,900 in the long term. A move from the current $2,766 to the two targets is a 178% and 258% surge. Such a price action is possible since ETH price has jumped by 212% from its lowest point in May 2022 and by 3,700% from its 2020 low. The caveat for this Ethereum price forecast is that it is on the weekly chart. This means that it wlll take time to form and complete. As the chart below shows, Titan’s forecast is that the coin will get to the target price in 2026. Ethereum Price Forecast Ethereum Price Short-Term Targets The daily chart shows that the Ethereum price has pulled back in the past few weeks. This crash is mostly because of the sluggish spot Ethereum inflows , continued sales by the Ethereum Foundation , and the fact that it is losing market share to Solana and BNB Chain . Ethereum, which used to lead in terms of fees, has been overtaken by other projects like Jito, Circle, and Tron. The chart shows that the value of ETH has formed a death cross as the 50-day and 200-day moving averages have flipped each other. Ethereum formed such a cross lastly in August 2024, and it dropped by over 20% afterwards. On the positive side, Ethereum is forming a bullish pennant chart pattern . This pattern is characterized by a vertical line and a symmetrical triangle pattern. It often leads to a strong bullish breakout. Therefore, more upside will be confirmed if the Ethereum price rises above the upper side of the pennant and the psychological point at $3,000. A move above that level will point to more gains as it will invalidate the death cross pattern. Ethereum Price Chart On the flip side, a drop below the lower side of the pennant pattern at $2,520 will invalidate the bullish view and risk it crashing to this month’s low of $2,160. The post Ethereum’s Giant Megaphone Pattern Sets $7.7K to $9.9K ETH Price Target appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Benefits of cryptocurrency for gambling enthusiasts
body: With the rise of digital technology, more and more players in the UK are choosing cryptocurrency online casinos. They offer fast transactions, anonymity and no strict banking restrictions, making them particularly attractive to those looking for freedom of choice. Unlike traditional platforms, many crypto casinos allow you to bypass GamStop restrictions, giving players more ways to play. One of the main advantages of such casinos are free spins no deposit non Gamstop , which allow new users to test out games without investing. This is a great opportunity for gambling enthusiasts to try out popular slots and table games, using cryptocurrency for fast and secure transactions. But how is cryptocurrency more favourable than traditional payment methods? Why are UK players increasingly choosing bitcoin, etherium and other digital assets? In this article, we'll break down the key benefits of cryptocurrency online casinos and explain how they are changing the UK gambling industry. Why is cryptocurrency ideal for online casinos? Modern technology and the rise in popularity of decentralised payments have dramatically changed the online gambling industry. Cryptocurrency is becoming more and more in demand due to its speed, security and anonymity. Solving the problems of traditional payment methods Traditional payment systems, such as bank transfers or credit cards, have a number of limitations: Long transaction processing times High fees Bank restrictions and blocking of transfers to casinos The need to disclose personal data Cryptocurrency saves players from these problems by offering instant transfers, low fees and no interference from banks or government agencies. Convenience and anonymity for players Anonymity is one of the main factors that attract players to cryptocurrency casinos. Using digital currencies such as Bitcoin or Ethereum allows: Make deposits and withdrawals without revealing personal information Avoid banking controls and tax restrictions Guarantee the safety of funds thanks to blockchain technology In addition, cryptocurrency transactions are irreversible, which reduces the risk of fraud and chargebacks by users. Rapid development of technology The popularity of blockchain and decentralised finance (DeFi) is driving the integration of cryptocurrencies into the online casino industry. More and more platforms are accepting Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin and other coins, as well as creating their own tokens and NFT loyalty programmes. Thus, cryptocurrency not only simplifies financial transactions at online casinos, but also makes the game more accessible, secure and private. Types of cryptocurrencies used in gambling Cryptocurrency has become an integral part of the online gambling industry, offering players fast, anonymous and secure payments. Unlike traditional methods such as bank cards or e-wallets, cryptocurrency transactions take place without intermediaries, making it convenient for international users. Online casinos that accept crypto attract players with low commissions, high payout speeds and exclusive bonuses. However, the choice of cryptocurrency plays an important role, as each of them has its own peculiarities. Bitcoin (BTC) Bitcoin is the first and most popular cryptocurrency widely used in online casinos. It offers a high level of security and anonymity thanks to blockchain technology. Many casinos accept BTC as the main payment method, offering instant deposits and fast payouts. However, due to bitcoin's busy network, commissions can be higher than other cryptocurrencies. Ethereum (ETH) Ethereum is the second most popular cryptocurrency and is characterised by its fast transaction speeds and the ability to use smart contracts. This makes it a convenient choice for online gambling, especially in casinos that support decentralised games (dApps). Commissions on the Ethereum network can vary depending on how busy the blockchain is, but transactions are generally faster than Bitcoin. Litecoin (LTC) Litecoin is a lightweight and fast alternative to Bitcoin. This cryptocurrency features low fees and fast transaction processing speeds, making it ideal for frequent deposits and withdrawals of winnings. Casinos that support LTC usually offer instant deposits and minimal withdrawal delays. Tether (USDT). Tether is a stablecoin pegged to the US dollar, making it a stable means of payment at online casinos. Using USDT avoids the volatility common to other cryptocurrencies and keeps your winnings equivalent to traditional currency. Many casinos accept USDT on the ERC-20 (Ethereum) and TRC-20 (Tron) networks, providing fast transactions and low fees. Tron (TRX). Tron is one of the most popular cryptocurrencies in gambling, thanks to its low fees and fast transaction speeds. Casinos that support TRX allow players to make deposits and withdraw winnings almost instantly, without additional costs. Tron is also actively used in decentralised applications (dApps), which makes it in demand among crypto-gambling enthusiasts. Dogecoin (DOGE). Dogecoin, originally created as a meme cryptocurrency, has gained popularity among players due to its low fees and fast transactions. Some online casinos accept DOGE for betting and offer special bonuses for users of this coin. Bitcoin Cash (BCH). Bitcoin Cash is a fork of bitcoin that offers faster and cheaper transactions. Its popularity in online gambling stems from the fact that it retains the advantages of BTC, but is faster and with lower fees. Ripple (XRP). Ripple is a cryptocurrency known for its super fast transactions and low fees. Although it is used less frequently in gambling than BTC or ETH, some casinos accept XRP for its efficiency in international payments. Benefits of cryptocurrency for gamblers Using cryptocurrency at online casinos offers players a host of benefits. Anonymity and confidentiality avoid unnecessary questions from banks, high speed transactions get rid of long waiting times for payments, and minimal commissions help to save money. In addition, cryptocurrency opens access to gambling all over the world, regardless of restrictions, and gives the opportunity to get exclusive bonuses. Anonymity and privacy One of the main advantages of cryptocurrency transactions is the ability to remain anonymous. Unlike traditional payment systems that require personal details such as first name, last name, bank card number and address, cryptocurrency transfers work without revealing your identity. When using bitcoin or other cryptocurrency, the player simply sends funds from one digital wallet to another using a unique address. This means that the owner's details remain hidden and the transaction is recorded in the blockchain without being tied to a specific person. Bank transfers and e-wallet payments are often subject to monitoring and can be blocked, especially when it comes to gambling-related transactions. In contrast, cryptocurrency is not subject to censorship, which means that players can deposit and withdraw winnings without too many questions from banks or payment systems. High speed of transactions Waiting to withdraw winnings is one of the most frustrating parts of online gambling. Traditional payment methods such as bank transfers or cards can take days to process. In some cases, if the transaction takes place on a weekend or public holiday, the wait can take even longer. Cryptocurrency solves this problem. Casino deposits made in bitcoin, ethereum or other digital currencies are credited instantly or within minutes. Withdrawals in cryptocurrency also take minimal time - in most cases the money arrives within an hour, while bank transfers can take several days to process. To avoid delays, it's worth choosing casinos that work with low-load blockchains, such as using Lightcoin or USDT on the Tron network, which process payments almost instantly. Minimal commissions Commissions are another reason why gamblers prefer cryptocurrency payments. Bank transfers, especially international ones, are often accompanied by additional fees that can reach several per cent of the amount. Even electronic payment systems like Skrill or Neteller take fees for transfers and currency conversions. Cryptocurrency allows players to save money, as the commissions are minimal or non-existent. For example, bitcoin transfers may have a small fee depending on network congestion, but if you use altcoins like Lightcoin or Tron, transaction costs are virtually nil. This is especially beneficial for players who make frequent deposits and withdrawals, as the savings on fees can be significant. Worldwide Availability In some countries, gambling is restricted or completely banned and banks block casino-related transactions. This creates difficulties for players who want to enjoy gambling but face restrictions. Cryptocurrency solves this problem as it does not depend on banking and government regulations. A player can easily transfer funds to the casino even if traditional payment methods are not available in their country. In addition, cryptocurrency works equally efficiently anywhere in the world. No matter where the player is located - in Europe, Asia or Latin America - he can easily deposit and withdraw winnings without being tied to national currencies or banking systems. Additional bonuses and promotions Many online casinos incentivise players to use cryptocurrency by offering exclusive bonuses for doing so. While standard deposit bonuses are available for all users, more favourable terms may be offered for players using bitcoins, etherium or other cryptocurrencies. title: Struggling Smart Assistants: AI Alexa and Siri Hit Unexpected Delays and Bugs
body: The anticipation for smarter, more intuitive AI voice assistants has been palpable, especially within the crypto and tech-forward community who understand the power of seamless technology. However, the path to sophisticated AI integration isn’t always smooth. Tech giants Amazon and Apple are discovering this firsthand as their highly anticipated generative AI upgrades for Alexa and Siri are reportedly facing significant hurdles. Why Are AI Voice Assistants Facing Setbacks? According to recent reports, both Amazon and Apple are grappling with unexpected bugs and engineering challenges as they attempt to infuse generative AI into their digital assistants. This news comes as a surprise to many, given the immense resources and technological prowess of these companies. Let’s break down what we know: Amazon’s Alexa Delay: Originally slated for a grand reveal in New York on February 26th, the revamped, generative AI Voice Assistants powered Alexa is now facing delays. The Washington Post reports that the launch is pushed back to March or potentially later. This setback indicates deeper issues than just minor tweaks. Apple’s Siri Struggles: Bloomberg’s report paints a similar picture for Apple. The ambitious AI overhaul of Siri is encountering engineering complexities and software bugs. Features initially planned for an April release might not materialize until May, or even later, suggesting significant roadblocks in development. These delays aren’t just minor hiccups; they represent a struggle to keep pace in the rapidly evolving landscape of voice technology and generative AI. The pressure is on for Amazon and Apple to compete with emerging AI voice technologies like OpenAI’s Advanced Voice Mode and Google’s Gemini Live, which are setting new benchmarks in the industry. The Race for Generative AI Supremacy: What’s at Stake? The urgency to upgrade AI Voice Assistants is fueled by the fierce competition in the AI space. Companies are racing to integrate generative AI, which promises more natural, context-aware, and human-like interactions. But what exactly are they trying to achieve, and why is it so challenging? Key Goals of Generative AI in Voice Assistants: Enhanced Natural Language Understanding: Moving beyond simple commands to understanding nuanced language, context, and even intent. Proactive Assistance: Anticipating user needs and offering help without explicit prompts, making interactions more seamless and intuitive. Personalized Experiences: Tailoring responses and functionalities based on user history, preferences, and real-time context. Complex Task Execution: Handling multi-step tasks, managing conversations more dynamically, and integrating with a wider range of services. Achieving these goals with generative AI is proving to be a formidable task. The reports of delays and bugs in Alexa Delays and Siri Bugs highlight the inherent complexities in deploying cutting-edge AI at scale for consumer products. What are the Potential Challenges Causing These Delays? While the exact nature of the bugs and engineering problems remains under wraps, we can speculate on some potential challenges that might be contributing to the Alexa Delays and Siri Bugs : Challenge Area Description Data Training and Bias: Generative AI models require vast amounts of data for training. Ensuring data quality, diversity, and mitigating biases is a monumental task. Poor data can lead to unpredictable behavior and bugs. Computational Demands: Generative AI models are computationally intensive. Running these models efficiently on consumer devices while maintaining responsiveness and battery life is a significant engineering hurdle. Real-time Processing and Latency: Voice assistants need to respond in real-time. Ensuring low latency for complex generative AI models is critical for a seamless user experience. Integration with Existing Systems: Integrating new generative AI capabilities with existing Alexa and Siri ecosystems, which are already complex, presents significant software engineering challenges. User Privacy and Security: Handling sensitive user data in generative AI models requires robust privacy and security measures. Ensuring compliance and building user trust is paramount. Impact on the Tech and Crypto Space While these delays might seem specific to Amazon and Apple, they have broader implications for the tech world and even the cryptocurrency space. Here’s why: Pace of AI Adoption: These setbacks serve as a reminder that even the most advanced companies face challenges in AI development. It might temper expectations about the speed of AI integration across various sectors, including blockchain and crypto. Investment in AI Infrastructure: The complexity of generative AI underscores the need for continued investment in AI infrastructure, including computing power, data storage, and skilled talent. This is relevant for blockchain projects exploring AI integration. Focus on Robustness and Reliability: The emphasis shifts from rapid deployment to ensuring robustness and reliability. In critical applications, like those in finance and crypto, stability is paramount. These delays highlight the importance of thorough testing and validation. Opportunities for Innovation: Challenges breed innovation. These delays might open doors for smaller, more agile startups to explore alternative approaches to generative AI in voice technology and beyond. Looking Ahead: What Can We Expect? While the delays for AI Alexa and AI Siri are a temporary setback, they are unlikely to derail the overall trajectory of AI development in voice assistants. Instead, they might lead to a more measured and realistic approach, focusing on quality and user experience over speed. For consumers, this means patience might be required before experiencing the full potential of generative AI-powered voice assistants. However, when these enhanced versions finally arrive, they are likely to be more polished, reliable, and truly transformative. The race for smarter AI is a marathon, not a sprint, and these delays are just part of the journey. To learn more about the latest AI Voice Assistants trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features.

title: Glassnode Identifies Next Major Bitcoin Support if BTC Loses $96K
body: Market analytics firm Glassnode has identified the next major Bitcoin support level to watch if the bulls lose the current region. The Glassnode report comes as Bitcoin continues to trade within a critical range, with its price hovering near $96,788. Specifically, the analytics resource emphasized that if Bitcoin loses its grip on $96K, the next major support could be much lower, as there is minimal resilience.Key Bitcoin Support Levels at $80.1K and $71KIn the report, Glassnode called attention to Bitcoin's adjusted MVRV Z-Score, an indicator that helps traders gauge price support zones. https://twitter.com/glassnode/status/1891438549506908518The firm noted that Bitcoin has been holding near its mean level of $96.3K, which marks a major threshold for market stability. According to Glassnode, if the price declines further, bulls might find the next major support at the -1.5 standard deviation (σ) level of $80.1K.For context, the last time Bitcoin saw the $80,000 region was in mid-November 2024, during the Donald Trump-led market-wide uptrend. Ever since the asset transcended this area, it has held above it, demonstrating resilience during the push to $89,164 in January 2025.However, Glassnode analysts believe BTC could revisit the $80K level if the current $96K support gives way. In addition, the firm called attention to Short-term holders (STHs). Specifically, the cost basis for this group sits at $92.2K, marking an important level for maintaining the current uptrend. Bitcoin Short-Term On-chain Cost Basis | Glassnode Additionally, the ±1σ bands, ranging between $71K and $131K, represent typical price boundaries. With Bitcoin still trading within this level, bulls maintain some control, but ongoing price action is testing their resilience.Further, major concern arises from the URPD volume profile, which indicates a liquidity gap below the current support, according to Glassnode's analysis . Few transactions have occurred in this range, suggesting that price movement into this zone could accelerate downward pressure. The -1σ level for STH cost basis, positioned at $71K, sits at the top of this liquidity void, making it a crucial region should Bitcoin's price dip further. Entity-Adjusted URPD | Glassnode Bitcoin Stuck Between Demand and Supply WallsMeanwhile, market analyst Ali Martinez recently pointed out that Bitcoin is currently stuck between strong demand and supply zones. A demand wall exists between $94,660 and $97,540, where market participants purchased about 1.43 million BTC. https://twitter.com/ali_charts/status/1890754182774464802Meanwhile, he confirmed that a supply wall between $97,650 and $99,470 accounts for about 1.16 million BTC. According to Martinez, a breakout in either direction could set the market trend.In a previous analysis , Martinez had highlighted a resistance level at $97,530, which BTC has broken and seeks to flip to support. Below $92,110, he said support is weak, with a significant gap stretching from $90K to $70K. This confirms Glassnode's warning that a failure to hold current levels could lead to deeper price corrections.Demand Remains StrongDespite the range-bound movements, on-chain analyst Darkfost noted that Bitcoin demand remains strong. He points to the 30-day moving average (DMA) of the exchange inflow/outflow ratio as a bullish indicator. When this ratio falls below 1, it suggests that more Bitcoin is leaving exchanges than entering, often a sign of accumulation. Despite Bitcoin fluctuating within the $90K–$105K range, the continued outflows show strong demand. Bitcoin Exchange Inflow|Outflow | CryptoQuant Notably, such trends historically have preceded short-term price increases. However, Darkfost cautions that some of these outflows could come from routine exchange transfers to institutional or custodial wallets.

title: Cardano Price Could Hit $7 Amid Growing Adoption – Analyst
body: Cardano price has gained by 14% in the last seven days and added $4 billion to its market capitalization. These gains follow bullish news including Grayscale’s filing for a Cardano spot exchange-traded fund (ETF) and a potential alliance with Microsoft. At press time, ADA trades at $0.805 after retreating slightly from a daily high of $0.812. Analysts remain optimistic that it could outperform other altcoins during this cycle and possibly hit record highs. Rising Adoption Could Push Cardano Price to $7 In his Cardano price forecast , analyst Investing Broz opined that ADA could rally to $7 and attain a $250 billion market capitalization. He attributed this rally to the hype around the potential approval of Cardano ETFs and rising institutional adoption. Institutions are making bets on Cardano price after the altcoin saw $1.9M in inflows last week per CoinShares. This was notably higher than Ethereum’s negative flows. Cardano’s inflows during the week came in as the third-highest among altcoins. CoinShares: Crypto Weekly Flows As for the altcoin’s short-term performance, Investing Broz noted that ADA’s value could push toward $2.72 in the coming months after a bull flag appeared on its weekly chart. Another analyst, Dan Gambardello, also added that ADA could outperform the rest of the altcoin market in the current cycle. He stated that it was the “obvious blue chip coin of the cycle” that carried significant “macro value.” As positive sentiment around ADA rises, the altcoin’s daily chart suggests that an uptrend could be underway. RSI Shows Rising Buying Pressure Cardano had bounced from the lower Bollinger band to the middle band on its one-day chart, suggesting a shift in momentum to the upside. At press time, ADA had flipped resistance at the middle band ($0.79), and if it closes above this level, it could signal strong gains. At the same time, the Relative Strength Index (RSI) line has been making higher lows for the past week, indicating that buying pressure is gaining strength. However, the RSI remains below 50, suggesting that bears remain in control. ADA/USDT 1-day chart If the bullish outlook holds, ADA’s next area of resistance lies at the upper band ($0.95). However, traders should watch out for a crossover of the RSI past 50 to confirm a bullish momentum. On the other hand, ADA’s open interest has surged by 27% in seven days per Coinglass data to $763 million. As open interest rises alongside the price, it reinforces the bullish thesis by showing conviction in the current trend. The post Cardano Price Could Hit $7 Amid Growing Adoption – Analyst appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Has the Market Sentiments Shifted From Memecoin to Fundamentals? Focus is Back on AAVE & Cardano Price Rally
body: The post Has the Market Sentiments Shifted From Memecoin to Fundamentals? Focus is Back on AAVE & Cardano Price Rally appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The quick gains and effortless profits had attracted many towards the memecoin space. New tokens were constantly been launched and within a few moments faced a massive rug pull. The latest example of CAR or LIBRA has shaken the trader’s confidence over these types of memecoins, as they have been squeezing out the liquidity from the top ones like Dogecoin, Shiba Inu, or Pepe. Meanwhile, a notable shift in sentiments has been witnessed among the market participants as they are again focusing more on fundamentals. The presumed dead token, like Cardano & Aave, has been attracting massive attention. Here’s what to expect from these tokens ahead. Cardano (ADA) Price Analysis After marking the highs above $1.2, the Cardano price has remained stuck within a bearish, descending parallel channel. The token has rebounded from the lower support of the channel and is heading towards the average bands. A rise above the range is expected to push the price towards the resistance, which is located above the psychological barrier at $1. Meanwhile, breaking above the channel may only trigger a bull run towards new highs. There are two major reasons to be bullish on Cardano: the rising RSI and bullish Ichimoku clouds. The conversion line and the baseline are about to undergo a bullish crossover while the RSI remains incremental. This suggests the bulls are gaining back control over the rally that may push the price above $0.86, which could push the levels beyond $0.9. Previously, the ADA price has failed to sustain above this range and hence, if the bulls manage to hold the rally, a rise above $1 is imminent. Aave (AAVE) Price Analysis The Aave price underwent a parabolic recovery after reaching the bottoms from the ATH above $660. Earlier, the price attempted to rise above $400 but the rise in bearish activity dragged the levels lower. However, the price has initiated a strong rebound, which suggests a rise to the pivotal resistance zone between $400 and $430 is imminent. The weekly chart of AAVE displays the very first bullish crossover between the weekly 50-day & 200-day MA levels. The impact has also been seen as the price has rebounded from the parabolic curve, which may push the prices towards the resistance zone. Meanwhile, the RSI, which had dropped below the support, is gearing up, and once it surges above the range, the AAVE price may begin a fresh rise and mark new highs above $700.

title: Revealed: Meta’s Shocking Pause on Book Licensing for AI Training Data
body: In a stunning turn of events for the world of artificial intelligence and copyright, recent court filings have shed light on Meta’s strategic shift regarding the data fueling its AI models. It appears the tech giant pressed pause on efforts to secure book licenses for AI training data , a move that has significant implications for the ongoing debate about fair use and intellectual property in the age of generative AI. Why Did Meta Halt Book Licensing for Generative AI Training? The revelation comes amidst the ongoing copyright lawsuit , Kadrey v. Meta Platforms , adding weight to previous whispers that Meta had cooled off on negotiations with book publishers. This legal battle is just one skirmish in a larger war between AI companies and creators, where the core question is: Is training AI on copyrighted material considered ‘fair use’? While AI companies like Meta argue in favor of fair use, copyright holders vehemently disagree. The newly submitted court documents, including deposition transcripts from Meta employees, suggest a pragmatic, if not slightly concerning, reason for the licensing pause. According to Sy Choudhury, Meta’s AI partnership lead, the outreach to publishers for book licensing met with unexpectedly low enthusiasm. Here’s a breakdown of the challenges Meta reportedly faced: Slow Publisher Engagement: Meta’s attempts to contact a wide range of top publishers for generative AI training data resulted in minimal responses. Many ‘cold calls’ went unanswered, indicating a lack of initial interest or perhaps apprehension from the publishing industry. Scalability Concerns: Even among publishers who did engage, the process seemed unsustainable. Negotiating individual licenses with numerous publishers for vast quantities of AI training data presented a logistical nightmare. Rights Ownership Issues: A significant hurdle emerged in the fiction category. Publishers often discovered they didn’t actually possess the rights to license content to Meta, as these rights resided with individual authors. This added layer of complexity would have required lengthy negotiations with countless authors. The ‘Fair Use’ Defense vs. The Copyright Lawsuit Meta’s stance in the copyright lawsuit hinges on the principle of ‘fair use,’ a legal doctrine that permits limited use of copyrighted material without permission under certain circumstances, such as criticism, commentary, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. AI companies argue that training their models falls under research and transformative use, thus qualifying as fair use. However, authors and copyright holders like Sarah Silverman and Ta-Nehisi Coates, the plaintiffs in Kadrey v. Meta Platforms , see things very differently. They argue that using their copyrighted books to train commercial AI models without explicit permission and compensation is a clear violation of copyright law. They contend that AI companies are profiting from their creative work without proper attribution or remuneration. Shadow Libraries and Torrenting: A Dark Side to AI Training Data? The amended complaint in the copyright lawsuit throws another serious allegation into the mix: Meta allegedly used ‘shadow libraries’ – essentially collections of pirated e-books – to train its generative AI models, including the popular Llama series. The complaint suggests Meta may have even used torrenting to access these illicit libraries. Torrenting, a peer-to-peer file-sharing method, requires users to not only download but also ‘seed’ (upload) files simultaneously. Plaintiffs argue that this seeding process constitutes copyright infringement, further complicating Meta’s legal position. Beyond Books: Meta’s Broader AI Training Data Strategy Interestingly, the court transcripts reveal this isn’t the first time Meta has paused licensing efforts related to AI training data . Choudhury mentioned a similar experience with licensing 3D worlds from game engine and game manufacturers for AI research. Faced with similar engagement challenges, Meta opted to develop its own solutions in that domain. This suggests a pattern: when licensing proves too difficult or slow, Meta seems inclined to explore alternative, in-house approaches for sourcing AI training data . What Does This Mean for the Future of AI and Copyright? Meta’s paused book licensing efforts and the ongoing copyright lawsuit highlight a critical juncture in the development of AI. The industry is grappling with fundamental questions about data sourcing, intellectual property rights, and the ethical implications of training AI models on vast amounts of copyrighted material. Here’s what we can infer from these developments: Increased Scrutiny on AI Training Data: The legal challenges are forcing AI companies to re-evaluate their data acquisition strategies and consider the potential legal and reputational risks associated with using copyrighted material without explicit consent. Potential Shift Towards Open and Public Domain Data: If licensing copyrighted material becomes prohibitively complex or legally risky, AI developers may increasingly turn to publicly available data or explore methods of synthetic data generation. The Evolving Definition of ‘Fair Use’: These lawsuits could ultimately shape the legal definition of ‘fair use’ in the context of AI training, setting precedents for future AI development and copyright law. Uncertainty for Content Creators: Authors and other creators are in a state of uncertainty, seeking clarity and fair compensation for the use of their work in the rapidly expanding AI landscape. The situation remains fluid, and the outcome of the copyright lawsuit against Meta, along with similar cases, will undoubtedly have a profound impact on how AI companies approach generative AI training and their relationship with copyright holders. The pause in book licensing by Meta could be a temporary setback or a sign of a more fundamental shift in strategy as the tech giant navigates these complex legal and ethical waters. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI Models features .
